user.title: Add Pilot Wire Thermostat
user.description:
Create a climate entity that controls a pilot wire module. 

 Once configured, the climate entity will appear in the Helpers tab. It will be automatically linked to the device of the select entity you chose during setup.

data_description.presets: Select entity used to control the presets.
data_description.temperature: Temperature sensor that reflects the current temperature.
data_description.power: Power sensor used to monitor heater activity.
data_description.power_threshold: Power threshold above which the heater is considered to be heating.
